attr.title: Hollow Knight
attr.desc: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns, battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.
attr.inst:
This port of Hollow Knight uses the Linux game assets with Box64. Wine is not involved. Copy your game assets to the `data` folder.

If you own the Steam version, you can use `download_depot 367520 367523 5829533265112705522` in the console to download the Linux package.
